author: francesb
title: Unplanned trip to Kerala
text: # 1 Hello all, As sometimes happens, what one thinks one wants turns out to not be what what one wants. When planning this trip, I thought I wanted to go to Spiti Valley and spend significant time in Himachal Pradesh. However, now that I'm here (Haridwar, at the moment), I've realized that I actually want to visit Kerala. (I will fly.) I plan to be there from 30 July to 18 August. I have no guidebooks, and my sole internet access is through my phone, which is inconvenient. My question: if I arrive in Cochin with NO PLAN WHATSOEVER, will it be reasonably easy to figure out a mid-range itinerary for three weeks? I want to spend some time in Cochin, do a backwaters cruise, and see tea planation. Please offer feedback on relative stupidity of this plan. Thank you,
